About

Who are you?

I am John P Holbrook, a high school student, robotics enthusiast, and amateur programming enthusiast based in Huntington, West Virginia, USA.

What do you do?

Like most people my age, I spend most of my time sleeping, eating, or attending school. When I'm not busy doing any of those things, I'm usually involved in one of my hobbies, which include robotics (as a mentor for teams participating in the FIRST LEGO League, as a member of a VEX Robotics Competition team, and as one half of the Hello World! YouTube channel), computing, sailing, playing the viola, and gently correcting people on reddit who use the term "LEGOs" incorrectly.

What have you done in the past?

See my "Projects" page for information about projects I've done.

What is this site?

This is my personal web site, where I put things of interest to me, including information about projects I've done and resources related to things I'm interested in.

How does it work?

This site is hosted using Jekyll and GitHub Pages. I've made use of Jekyll's Layouts feature so that I can update change the content of the site and its design independently of one another. You can view the GitHub repository for this site here.
